text: Picramnia bullata is a species of plant in the Picramniaceae family, that is only known from its type specimen, which was collected from Loreto Province in Peru. It grows naturally in Amazon basin rainforest. ==References== Category:Picramniales Category:Flora of the Amazon Category:Flora of Peru Category:Vulnerable flora of South America Category:Plants described in 1990 Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Picramnia bullata
